name: CTFd
description: CTFd is a Capture The Flag framework focusing on ease of use and customizability. It comes with everything you need to run a CTF and it's easy to customize with plugins and themes.

UPLOAD_PROVIDER.description: Specifies the service that CTFd should use to store files

DROPBOX_OAUTH2_TOKEN.description: Dropbox developer oauth2 token used to authenticate to your Dropbox account

DROPBOX_ROOT_PATH.description: Dropbox root path where to store files.
